name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook the fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook in a skillet until no longer pink. Slice into strips.
In a separate pan, melt butter. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Add cooked pasta and chicken strips to the sauce. Toss to coat evenly.
Garnish with chopped parsley. Serve hot and enjoy!
